references.paper_title: Probing the 3d awareness of visual foundation models
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the core question of the main paper regarding the 3D understanding capabilities of large vision models.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces DINO, a self-supervised vision transformer model, which is one of the key models investigated in the main paper for its 3D understanding capabilities.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a key generative model investigated in the main paper for its ability to generate images that reflect 3D physical properties.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that bridges image and text data, which is used in the main paper to study its ability to encode 3D physical properties.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces VQGAN, another generative model studied in the main paper for its capacity to generate high-resolution images, offering another perspective on 3D scene understanding.
